page.title: 02Life in Middlestone Village.
page.content: On Wednesday we went to{Middlestone Village. We found out lots of information about the village. The population is 57. The{Ship Inn}is the only amenity in the village. There is a small patch of grass with some swings. The village is small and cut off from everything, the nearest shop is in Kirk Merrington. The only bus that comes through the village is the {Eden,}but it only comes once an hour. On Sunday it only runs in the afternoon. There are 2 rows of houses in Middlestone, the High Road and the Low Road. There are 2 farms in Middlestone, the{West End Farm}which is owned by Mr. Clark, and the{East {Farm}which is owned by Mr.Blacket. We went to East Farm.
